Articles.Content: Been playing KSP for a little more than 4 years been great to see it come so far and now to be out of pre release. I'm college student studying AstroPhysics, love space and anything to do with it, why I love this game so much. I'm excited to muck around the Forums and try some challenges.
Welcome aboard! I'm looking to study to become a Physics teacher, myself!
Welcome! I'd say that you'll feel right at home, but obviously you've been playing for longer than me. So, welcome again!
Wow, long time player. Welcome to the community!
